scripts.test: npm run build && echo "Do some validations..."
scripts.deploy-push: cd _site && git init && git config user.email "$GIT_EMAIL" && git config user.name "$GIT_NAME" && git remote add upstream https://${GH_USERNAME}:${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/${CONFIG_OWNER}/${CONFIG_REPO}.git && git fetch upstream && git reset upstream/gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add -A . && git commit -a -m "Travis build $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER at $REV" && git push --quiet upstream HEAD:gh-pages
